thoughts.text: I think I should use the `browse_website` command to learn more about the Brno Reservoir trail and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations. This will help me plan my exploration and make the most of my time.
thoughts.reasoning: I want to learn as much as possible about the trail and the educational stations before I go, so I can be prepared and know what to expect. Browsing the website will give me access to detailed information and maps that will be useful for planning my trip.
thoughts.plan:
- Browse the AllTrails website to learn more about the Brno Reservoir trail and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations
- Take notes on the trail length, difficulty, and other important information
- Use the information to plan my exploration and make the most of my time
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to spend too much time browsing the website and get distracted from my goal of exploring the trail. I should also make sure to double-check any information I find on the website with other sources to ensure its accuracy.
thoughts.speak: I will use the `browse_website` command to learn more about the Brno Reservoir trail and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations.

args.question: What is the length and difficulty of the Brno Reservoir trail, and what are the six ecologically focused stations on the educational trail?
